description: This Jugakor Hydration Bottle is perfect for staying hydrated throughout the day. The bottle from Amazon shows a sleek, clear design with 'SHOTAY' branding and a bright green strap, whereas the second-hand bottle shows noticeable wear, including a color change and 'SMARTFOOD' branding visible along with potential scratches and faded areas on the surface. Despite these cosmetic issues, the bottle is still functional and in good overall condition, ideal for daily hydration needs. The item is second-hand and priced accordingly.
